content: gidday australian colloquialism for hello a warm greeting of affection gidday baby is a superbly simple cardigan a striped garter stitch circular yoke is accentuated with cute buttons and a stocking stitch body this cardigan is knit top down and seamlessly with added attention paid to the simple details the body is knit flat and the sleeves are knit in the round simple yarn over increases which can be worked as a feature or closed are used to shape the yoke gidday is perfect for accentuating those special yarns the sample garments have been knit in white gum wool 8ply which is an ethically farmed 100% merino the story behind white gum wool can be seen here 1 this is a must watch story for yarn lovers gidday baby was originally released in april 2014 as part of a non-mystery kal read below for an explanation as to why a series of blog posts explore the different parts of the pattern and offer support to beginner knitters as well as those looking to polish their skills part one before the knitting 2 part two the yoke 3 knitting through the back of the loop and twisted loops 4 part three splitting and the body 5 part four the sleeves 6 * * * * * * * ** * * * ** * ** * ** ** ** * ** * mystery kals knit-a-longs are pretty hot property at the moment they re all over the place on ravelry instagram and all the knitty crafty interwebs hangouts anyway all these mystery kals got me thinking about a kal where you knew what you were going to be knitting you knew exactly what you were going to end up with at the end of the kal but it was still a new unreleased pattern and just like a mystery kal you were only given a wee part of the pattern each week does that sound like fun like something you d like to be a part of i thought it did so i came up with this kal which is suitable for both beginner and experienced knitters alike it is a chatty kal where we will talk techniques tips and all sorts of things at the end you come out with some new ideas and techniques as well as a cute wee baby cardigan and everyone needs a cute wee baby cardie for gifting **want larger sizes ** gidday 7 is the full size range version of this pattern 15-30
